resources.string: TapLock - Double Tap to Lock Your Screen
The TapLock accessibility service is necessary to be able to power off the screen.
With this app, you can create a resizable transparent widget for your home screen. Double-tap the widget to lock your phone instantly! Accessibility permissions are required for this to work.
This app collects no personal information and does not access your data. For transparency, the source code is available via the link below:
To add the widget, please go to your home screen, long-press on empty space, and find the TapLock widget.
TapLock needs accessibility services to detect double taps and lock the screen. TapLock does not collect any other data or interaction that you have with your device.
Once TapLock has been enabled in the Accessibility settings, to open this panel again long-press the app icon and select the \"TapLock Settings\" shortcut.
